quoteText: All Users that are natural persons must be of full legal age, meaning at least 18 years old (“Adults”). AS A MINOR YOU ARE NOT ENTITLED TO USE FLATTR.
title: Age limit of 18

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: Flattr is available only to individuals who are at least 18 years old.
